Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband and he LOVES it. Plus all the extra items that come with it are great. It was a great value!

Reviews.Title: 5D mark III review
Reviews.Author: Brandall Atkinson
Reviews.Content: I am a professional photographer and the Mark iii is my third 5D to own since going digital.  The Mark iii far exceeded all my expectations and was worth every penny.  You get what you pay for and this camera is worth it.  Image quality is incredible and the additional focusing points make a huge difference compared to the Mark ii.  Very very happy with this camera-highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: CJeff65
Reviews.Content: Best price found for this camera and accessories.  Camera is professional quality, accessories are on the cheaper end. Good deal!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Xiaodong Li
Reviews.Content: camera is very nice. the accessories are low end though. some of them, for example, the flash is not for such a good camera at all. the batteries, charger, bag, and memory are nice.
